InputActionManager
MonoBehaviour
[DefaultExecutionOrder(-1)]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​InputActionManager

The manager for all InputActions to be handled and distributed. This runs the received data through any referenced InputActionPlugins and finaly distributes the data via the  TransmitInputAction event which should be listened to by any class hoping to make use of incoming InputActions.

Delegates
InputActionEvent
public delegate void InputActionEvent(
InputAction _inputData
)

An Action to distribute a InputAction via the TransmitInputAction event listener.

Variables
TransmitInputAction
public static event InputActionEvent TransmitInputAction

An event for transmitting InputActions that have been modified via the active plugins

TransmitRawInputAction
public static event InputActionEvent TransmitRawInputAction

An event for transmitting InputActions that have NOT been modified via any plugins

Instance
public static InputActionManager Instance
plugins
[Tooltip("These plugins modify InputActions and are performed in order.")]
[SerializeField]
ToggleablePlugin[] plugins

A pre-defined plugin array of ToggleablePlugins that modify incoming InputActions based on custom rules.

Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​ToggleablePlugin

A Data structure used to toggle the use of plugins.
